text.description: The request or the follow-up message to send to the agent.

taskId.description: The ID of the task this message is part of. ONLY include if continuing an existing task (e.g., input-required); otherwise OMIT.

contextId.description: The context ID for this message, used to group related interactions. OMIT on first message; include on subsequent messages.

referenceTaskIds.description: A list of other task IDs that this message references for additional context.
